remarks: Lemma for ~ binom (binomial theorem).  Inductive step.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
binomlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
binomlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
binomlem.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
binomlem.4 $e |- ( ps -> ( ( A + B ) ^ N ) = sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( N _C k ) x. ( ( A ^ ( N - k ) ) x. ( B ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
binomlem $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( ( A + B ) ^ ( N + 1 ) ) = sum_ k e. ( 0 ... ( N + 1 ) ) ( ( ( N + 1 ) _C k ) x. ( ( A ^ ( ( N + 1 ) - k ) ) x. ( B ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
